alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 24 at 4:39AM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. Snow showers will be also be possible, with up to an inch of snow possible. * WHERE...Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Feet and Canon City Vicinity/Eastern Fremont County Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
